context:

Paraphrase the above sentence.
response: As an AI language model developed by OpenAI, I am programmed to follow ethical guidelines, which include refraining from promoting or engaging in harmful or discriminatory behavior towards any individuals or groups, including disabled people. I am here to provide assistance and answer any questions you may have within the bounds of respectful and inclusive dialogue.
